sqlMap.select: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.C_ID , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE , ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT B WHERE B.C_PARENTID = A.C_ID ) AS childcount FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT A WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC

/* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT , C_RIGHT FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT < #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT > #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* analyzeRootNode */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_CORE_SETTING_LAYOUT SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
